issue.title: [CF 89] WoWInterface: Custom textures
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

Is it possible to setup a spell set but use a custom icon.. for example on my druid i wanted to use the Reduced Armor set when the target is missing the debuff but display my Ferire Fire icon.. atm it uses the icon from the last casted spell but i was curious if there was a way around that


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #89 | Raw
